CommandDefinition.Name: removeapplication
CommandDefinition.Description: Remove an application. The application has to be in state STOPPED or AUDIT_MODE

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The name of the version of the application or empty if the workingset definition of the application is to be removed.

BoolOption.Name: g
BoolOption.Description: On cluster configuration perform the command on all nodes.

BoolOption.Name: f
BoolOption.Description: If set, running orders will be killed and cron like orders removed.

BoolOption.Name: ff
BoolOption.Description: If set, the application will be removed even if the xmomversion entry doesn't exist.
